Class Department

  • java.lang.Object
    • Department

  • public class Department
extends java.lang.Object
    The purpose of this assignment is to introduce us to creating our own objects, along with private data, constructors, and also methods such as toString method. In this project, i created two supplier classes that interact with each other (through a “has a” relationship). A student and a department class This is the department class. In this class, there are two constructors,one with four parameters and the other empty constructor. In this class, we calculate (number of groups)and keep track of total number of students enrolled in a class. Everytime a new student is added, the total student is incremented and kept track of. Also the total balance is calculated and kept track of. Mutators and Accessors are created that asign values and retrieve and return information to the calling program respectively.
